title: Who faces lot of struggles in life, men or women? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do not think that one is more than another. I Seen woman and men both go through hard times , one in which a women overdosed another where person I knew went to Jail for life. At any point you can make a subjective point of view on who goes through more difficulties on average. It really is based on the person, the environment and the character of the person. Even in hard time a person going through tough times can be seen to make it out of the darkness. But some are rich and in all the power of the world and come crumbling down because of choices that don’t make sense. Taken a step further you can always look at what some go through based on country restrictions, that includes all people, woman who are not allowed to drive versus people in general who can get their heads cut off for not helping the local regime be it in central or south america or in the middle east. In conclusion, it is based on the event and situation. Neither can claim that one has it worse or better than the other. Because bad and good things happen to both.
